ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description: Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

name: dagstermill
raw_meta_yaml:
# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prefix-dev/recipe-format/main/schema.json
schema_version: 1

context:
  # source-of-truth
  version: '0.28.7'
  python_max: '3.13'
  python_max_exclusive: '3.14'
  # package-specific
  # (pyspark <4 and great-expectations <1) require numpy <2, not built for python 3.13
  python_numpy1_max: '3.12'
  # derived
  patch_version: ${{ (version | split('.'))[2] }}
  dagster: dagster ==1.12.${{ patch_version }}
  # utility
  pip_install: -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation --disable-pip-version-check

recipe:
  name: dagster-libs
  # the epoch is due to a historic issue with `conda-build` outputs
  # https://github.com/conda-forge/dagster-feedstock/issues/301
  version: 1!${{ version }}

build:
  number: 0

outputs:
  # A
  - package:
      name: dagster-airbyte
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-airbyte/dagster_airbyte-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 665aaeab82c6946675d669259d36e2e61ecdba65e45c758ab62daef749b6b28c
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-airbyte = dagster_airbyte.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_airbyte
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script: dagster-airbyte --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-airbyte
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Airbyte with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-aws
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-aws/dagster_aws-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 77ec88a89b46043a934b0a1358638c370e3b4f22291d96bd12ef615f8696f9e3
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - boto3
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_aws
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-aws
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for AWS-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.
  # B
  # C
  - package:
      name: dagster-celery
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery/dagster_celery-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 4832a1ed94cddd3e195bcda162b167d287509d7749d6a080d60579929bb194ef
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-celery = dagster_celery.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - celery >=4.3.0
        - click >=5.0,<9
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script: dagster-celery --help

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Celery as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-docker/dagster_celery_docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: ca5c382cf876360aa045daa0d88912ecceabd783de569cb75bb2099f134477f0
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - dagster-graphql
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery_docker
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-docker

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-k8s
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-k8s/dagster_celery_k8s-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: d07be31c3c0bdf88ffc9f93e545b7cb3bc9a6a8d70b53d0be75f2710b4904a95
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-k8s", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery_k8s
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-k8s
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-k8s-executor

  - package:
      name: dagster-census
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-census/dagster_census-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 36357537c5c2b60f0100132a448b282dc45b204de92a37f6aacb3c0f37bf2749
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_census
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-census
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Census with Dagster.

  # D
  - package:
      name: dagster-dask
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dask/dagster_dask-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: d1384d0e8fc4ddeaf78111c26b4741cd44cc2406527858cfa484d5b750414393
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - bokeh
        - dask >=1.2.2
        - distributed >=1.28.1
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_dask
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dask
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Dask as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-datadog
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-datadog/dagster_datadog-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 4afd8eeff80f003838d6d236acb1d57fafaf93f828f4df41859db6cd7309d3b8
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - datadog
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_datadog
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-datadog
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for datadog Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-dbt
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dbt/dagster_dbt-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: bdf79316266c538fd994b1a670340a4f20171187b5308d215b3c24bae0fc0384
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud = dagster_dbt.cloud.cli:app
          - dagster-dbt = dagster_dbt.cli.app:app
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        # see https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-dbt/dagster_dbt/dbt_core_version.py
        - dbt-core >=1.7,<1.11
        - gitpython
        - jinja2
        - networkx
        - orjson
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - python-dateutil
        - requests
        - rich
        - sqlglot-rs <28.1.0
        - typer >=0.9.0
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_dbt
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud --help
          - dagster-dbt --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dbt
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for dbt

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake/dagster_deltalake-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 8cafa1878b5b71f4deb2afe2376d1d3047bf9c9cba8765234735146811d38f1d
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - deltalake >=1.0.0
        - pyarrow
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Deltalake-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-pandas/dagster_deltalake_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 7553407f9fa0975e905413621824d877284409e76bd1c86097a7298109c56396
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in Delta tables

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-polars/dagster_deltalake_polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: f820a2dac3d9835521ff14359851f8199c7cb81578927c0bbb99e90203680871
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - polars
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        # TODO: update after https://github.com/conda-forge/polars-feedstock/issues/194
        # for now https://github.com/pola-rs/polars/blob/main/py-polars/pyproject.toml#L52C13-L52C29
        - pyarrow >=7.0.0
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake_polars
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in Delta tables.

  - package:
      name: dagster-dlt
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dlt/dagster_dlt-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: a2576148a3ecf3249d0990a543a997498ff4709beb548bd8a216c134f5d10a5c
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - dlt >=0.4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_dlt
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-dlt
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: This library provides a Dagster integration with dlt

  - package:
      name: dagster-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-docker/dagster_docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: dff493ea5be497881c7232492ef912fe4b9bae2d7326decfc75d336c431cd899
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - docker-image-py
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_docker
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for docker

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb/dagster_duckdb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 0c0889ebfdf5d4e54c9d6f25df60e507e61999f618a6a71c3dca7c9a3b9b015d
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - python-duckdb
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for DuckDB-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pandas/dagster_duckdb_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: f431eb8e8d8e7a511060deabae2982c333c7bd853a37d3e150b6cc980e40b2fe
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in DuckDB.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-polars/dagster_duckdb_polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: ee5223484828ca8400b3a1e8cade46e68b52402c4d5d7175a336cbc18753a7ca
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyarrow >=4.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        # TODO: get polars-with-X outputs
        - polars
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_polars
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in DuckDB.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pyspark/dagster_duckdb_pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 7cbf7a35b7f3ab22c387e3ed77eaf9da8c702a03b478692c80da8c65bbc9ec83
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - pyarrow
        - pyspark >=3.5,<4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_pyspark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            # TODO: replace with python_max when pyspark >=5
            - ${{ python_numpy1_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing PySpark DataFrames in DuckDB.

  # E
  # F
  - package:
      name: dagster-fivetran
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-fivetran/dagster_fivetran-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 81f6050347dd7db50cf4e31b3da2af058ea70b976e6a9506577bb3f23aa307b9
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-fivetran = dagster_fivetran.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_fivetran
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagster-fivetran --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-fivetran
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Fivetran with Dagster.

  # G
  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp/dagster_gcp-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 793e80f25cac2001895151b6a71b44b2ad7979a62f5639911111f0ba51e93f5f
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-pandas", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - db-dtypes
        - google-api-python-client
        - google-cloud-bigquery-core >=1.28.3
        - google-cloud-storage
        - oauth2client
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports:
            - dagster_gcp
            - dagster_gcp.bigquery
            - dagster_gcp.dataproc
            - dagster_gcp.gcs
          pip_check: true
          python_version:

        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_spark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-spark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Spark Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-ssh
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-ssh/dagster_ssh-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 1811dad1ac8ebf5f162ff74dd6270830680a1384721d5db8e972dfd665aced7c
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - paramiko
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - sshtunnel
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_ssh
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-ssh
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for ssh Dagster framework components.

  # T
  - package:
      name: dagster-tableau
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-tableau/dagster_tableau-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: c666f20ab90873c41a110d9c9c3a439aec150a16896865c04c22843347b1f568
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - pyjwt
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - tableauserverclient >=0.32
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_tableau
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-tableau
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Build assets representing Tableau workbooks and sheets.

  - package:
      name: dagster-twilio
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-twilio/dagster_twilio-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 2969cb7d6f63933ee4d3935a586961a701d05c8e9543fbce0416d3fbbeae3e7c
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - twilio
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_twilio
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-twilio
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for twilio

  # U
  # V
  # W
  - package:
      name: dagster-wandb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-wandb/dagster_wandb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: b4093abd8d377fc339c9b4c63a18968b8e33278d16190fa652e2745c60620b38
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - wandb >=0.15.11,<1.0
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_wandb
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-wandb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for wandb Dagster components.

  # X
  # Y
  # Z

  # not hyphenated

  - package:
      name: dagstermill
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagstermill/dagstermill-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 59a147b6b305938cf305d8f6114b8da4c41ba6d70c02d9371448669341f7e172
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagstermill = dagstermill.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ipykernel >=4.9.0,!=5.4.0,!=5.4.1
        - ipython_genutils >=0.2.0
        - jupyter_client <8
        - nbconvert
        - packaging >=20.9
        - papermill >=1.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - scrapbook >=0.5
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagstermill
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagstermill --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagstermill
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for papermill

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io
  summary: The data orchestration platform built for productivity.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  documentation: https://docs.dagster.io
  description: >-
    Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

extra:
  feedstock-name: dagster-libs
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
    - conda-forge/dagster
